Title: Requires enacted budget financial plan estimates to be provided to the legislature prior to a vote on certain budget bills
Summary: Requires enacted budget financial plan estimates to be provided to the legislature prior to a vote on certain budget bills.
LawCode: Amd ยง23, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to requiring enacted budget financial plan estimates to be provided to the legislature prior to a vote on certain budget bills
